events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your skills in software development and DevOps experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process for our engineering team.
Your profile matches the requirements, and we would like to proceed with an initial screening call to discuss your software engineer background.
Thank you for your prompt reply. I am available for a screening call tomorrow afternoon and look forward to discussing the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 10 AM UTC to evaluate your software engineering and DevOps skills.
The interview panel was impressed with your problem-solving abilities and coding expertise demonstrated during the technical session.
We have scheduled an HR interview for May 9th at 2 PM UTC to discuss your fit with our company culture and benefits.
You successfully completed the HR interview, and the team was pleased with your alignment with company values and communication skills.
We are excited to formally extend a job offer for the Software Engineer position, reflecting the positive impression you have made.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer. We are glad to hear that the terms are agreeable and you are excited to join our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer. We look forward to you joining our engineering department and contributing your expertise.
Your onboarding process has begun with all necessary materials and access provided to help you integrate smoothly into our engineering team.
The recruitment case for your software engineer role is now officially closed as you have successfully joined and started your new position.
